name: Cardinal Attack
description:
Can you survive 2 minutes versus Cardinal? It's a challenge for you!
Avoid-hardcore game under pumping music!

Controls
Move: A-D or arrows
Flip: Space or Up

Information about:

The game is my first on LD48
The game is developed by 30h with 8hours sleeping
Used Unity, FLStudio, bfxr and paint.net
This game has a difficulty that i wanted, game is beatable! ;]

Ludum Dare page
